name: Irish Soda Bread
author: Fr. Oliver Clavin
instructions: Put all dry ingredients into bowl and mix. Rub in the margarine with fingertips. Make a well in the center and pour in the buttermilk. Mix well and knead lightly. Roll into a ball, using a little flour. Place dough in a deep round floured 8 inch cake pan or iron skil- let (a loaf pan can be used). With a floured knife, make a deep cross across the top of the bread. Bake in 400Â° oven for 40 minutes. Remove the bread from the pan immediately and wrap in a towel. Stand it on its edge to cool.
